results.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
results.reason: Encouragement to seek God in times of worry or anxiety.
results.reflection: Instead of worrying, bring your concerns to God in prayer.

results.text: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
results.reason: Encouragement to prioritize God in all aspects of life.
results.reflection: When we seek God first, He provides for all our needs.

results.text: Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.
results.reason: Call to trust in God's sovereignty and power.
results.reflection: In moments of chaos, find peace in knowing God is in control.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: Assurance of God's presence and support in times of fear.
results.reflection: God's presence brings strength and peace in times of trouble.

results.text: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
results.reason: Assurance that God works all things for the good of His people.
results.reflection: Even in difficult circumstances, trust that God is working for your good.
